CODE OF SANTA CRUZ SHUT THE FUCK UP AND LISTEN LET IT IN

EGO KILLS MEN ‡ HUMILITY FEEDS MEN ‡ HONOR THE MEN ‡ COMPROMISE KILLS ‡ GET PAST THE WALL ‡ YOU CAN’T HAVE IT BOTH WAYS ‡ YOUR STOP IS THEIR STOP ‡ LIVE BY THE CODE OF HONOR ‡ TRUST THE MEN ‡ WE DON’T KNOW WHAT THE FUCK WE ARE DOING ‡ RECOGNIZE THE SIGNS AND ACT ON THEM ‡ YOU CANNOT LEAD UNTIL YOU WILL FOLLOW ‡ ON THE OTHER SIDE IS THE TRUTH ‡ BARRIERS KILL MEN ‡ NO ONE OWNS THE TRUTH ‡ YOU DON’T HAVE A CHOICE ‡ NO SHIT, WE’RE TALKING ABOUT MEN’S LIVES ‡ REMEMBER, YOUR COMMITMENT HAS NO END ‡ LEST WE FORGET ‡ WE DON’T KNOW WHAT WE NEED ‡ NEVER DILUTE TO TASTE ‡ DON’T MAKE IT UP ‡ NO MAN CAN SERVE TWO MASTERS, SO CHOOSE ‡ LEARN WHERE TO LET SOME THINGS GO ‡ TRUST THE MEN WHO ARE DOING THE JOB ‡ REMEMBER THE FACES AND THE NAMES ‡ SEE THE TOMBSTONES ‡ FEEL THE PAIN ‡ REMEMBER WHEN YOU SEE THEIR FACES ‡ SHARE THE GRIEF ‡ EGO IS NOT WORTH DYING FOR ‡ BE VIGILANT, DANGER NEVER ENDS ‡ IT CAN HAPPEN HERE ‡ LEARN FROM THE DEATH OF OTHER MEN ‡ LOOK- ING GOOD AND BEING RIGHT HAVE NO PLACE ‡ YOU LIE AND MEN DIE ‡ LOYALTY IS NOT THE SAME AS COMMITMENT ‡ LOYALTY MUST NEVER KILL PURPOSE ‡ YOUR EGO IS A LIAR ‡ WHAT IN THE FUCK ARE WE DOING? ‡ RUTHLESS COMPASSION ‡ NO MORE DEAD BODIES ‡ GIVE THE WEEKEND ‡ DON’T DO IT ALONE ‡ DON’T SELL OUT THE MEN ‡ PICK UP THE WOUNDED ‡ IT AIN’T HARD TO FUCK IT UP ‡ IT’S ABOUT THE MEN, NOT THE LEADER ‡ BE PREPARED TO DIE BEFORE THE MEN ‡ LEAD BY LIVING THE SPIRIT OF THE WEEKEND ‡ BEING NICE KILLS ‡ DON’T BE A LIVE COMMANDER IN A DEAD ARMY ‡ FREEDOM IS NO CHOICE ‡ LISTEN ‡ FOLLOW INSTRUCTIONS ‡ THIS WAY OF LIFE IS NOT A GAME ‡ IT COULD HAPPEN AGAIN ‡ DON’T QUIT ‡

‡ REMEMBER SANTA CRUZ ‡ A DIVISION THAT FAILED, WAS DISBANDED
